title: Sinatra's coldest role: Assassin stalks President - Suddenly 1954 | Colorized Classic Movie

sources.title: Sinatra's coldest role: Assassin stalks President - Suddenly 1954 | Colorized Classic Movie
sources.description:
A COLD-BLOODED THRILLER!  The tranquility of a small town named Suddenly is marred when the U.S. President comes to town.
A mysterious trio takes a family hostage in a hillside house overlooking the train station. With a high-profile passenger due to arrive, Sheriff Tod Shaw (Sterling Hayden) and retired agent "Pop" Benson (James Gleason) must outsmart the invaders before time runs out. Frank Sinatra shocks in a career-changing performance as the chilling villain John Baron!

Watch the B&W version: https://youtu.be/IiCbaTkdEGM
